name: website-api
description: Serverless back-end for Case Consulting website

scripts.build:invoke:apply: npm run build && npm run invoke:apply
scripts.build:invoke:upload: npm run build && npm run invoke:upload
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy:packaged:dev
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy:packaged:test
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run package:prod && npm run deploy:packaged:prod
scripts.deploy:packaged:dev: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=dev ClientProtocol=http ClientDomain=localhost:8080 DestinationEmail=zramsis@consultwithcase.com,logburn@consultwithcase.com --stack-name website-api-dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:packaged:test: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=test ClientDomain=app-website.netlify.app --stack-name website-api-test --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:packaged:prod: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=prod ClientDomain=www.consultwithcase.com DestinationEmail=afarmer@consultwithcase.com,cmartin@consultwithcase.com,logburn@consultwithcase.com,cvincent@consultwithcase.com,abendele@consultwithcase.com --stack-name website-api-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1 --profile prod
scripts.deploy:support:test: npm run package:support && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-support.yaml --stack-name case-website-support-test --parameter-overrides Stage=test
scripts.deploy:support:prod: npm run package:support && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-support.yaml --stack-name case-website-support-prod --parameter-overrides Stage=prod
scripts.invoke:apply: sam local invoke ApplyFunction --env-vars env.json --event events/apply.json
scripts.invoke:upload: sam local invoke UploadFunction --env-vars env.json --event events/upload.json
scripts.outdated: npm outdated; npm run outdated:apply; npm run outdated:upload; npm run outdated:workable
scripts.package:support: aws cloudformation package --template-file support.yaml --s3-bucket case-consulting-website-code-dev --output-template-file packaged-support.yaml
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.reinstall: npm install && npm ci && npm run reinstall:apply && npm run reinstall:upload && npm run reinstall:workable
scripts.reinstall:apply: cd apply && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:upload: cd upload && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:workable: cd workable && npm install && npm ci
